title: Rune Descriptions Should Remember The Toggle You Set
body:
I shouldn't have to click "Show detailed descriptions during comparison (or hold SHIFT)" every single time I go into my runes, that wastes time.
If you have it turned on it should stay on forever until turned off, or just not have the option and keep descriptions on permanently because there is no viable reason to not have the numbers shown from the start.

It's the little things that matter, and this is one of the more annoying ones.

UPDATE: 
>Riot Sparkle (NA) 
Yes, they should. Fix for this bug is coming with the 7.23 patch.
EDIT: It will also remember your line vs. grid mode preferences.

replies.body:
Yes, they should. Fix for this bug is coming with the 7.23 patch.

EDIT: It will also remember your line vs. grid mode preferences.

Will the bug where editting it only shows the X button and the top side of the frame (thus unable to edit runes in champion select) also be fixed? I don't know if it's also happening in NA, but it's affecting me most of my games.

Yes, it is happening in NA and is p annoying. We're working on multiple fixes for this one as we speak (turns out this can happen for a few reasons), at least some of which should make it into 7.23.

If you get that bug, restarting your client usually fixes it (which is not super useful when you can't edit your runes in champion select, I know, but it should help with the next game). 

PS - We have a [known bugs list over in Dev Corner if you're wondering what the rest of our highest priority bugs are](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/WThcHqPn-preseason-runes-722-update).

On a side note, can we turn off the ambient sounds in the background of runepages without having to turn off all the sounds to the client?

Also, for some reason the ambience in the end of match screen tends to persist after going back to the main client. (only way to turn it off is by going into runepage selection)
THANK YOU.

Is there a possibility to set up Runes so when you change them around for one match, have the page revert back to the way you had them before the match instead of being forced to save the temporary changes you make for that one match?

Can we also have the list in champion select remember what you per priorly 

the drop down which lets you select 'sort by name' 'sort by mastery' and 'sort by favorite'

This would help alot for people who own all the champions and have champs listed as favorites. 
Also if we could edit the favorites outside of champ select in the champion screen that would be awesome also.
